DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose of this study is to determine whether Adductor-Canal-Block (ACB) is superior to placebo when it comes to analgetic efficacy after Knee-Arthroscopy.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy of Adductor-Canal-Block (ACB) in Patients After Knee Arthroscopy
DOC.criteria: 1880 years Kneearthroscopy Written consent ASA IIII BMI 1935 Unable to communicate in Danish Allergic reactions toward drugs used in the trial Pregnancy Abuse of alcohol/drugs Daily opioid intake Infection at injection site Can not be mobilised to 5 meters of walk; presurgery
